item.title: CVE-2024-1721|2024-06-06T13:12:54.314Z -- hypr -- passwordless
item.description: Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature vulnerability in HYPR Passwordless on Windows allows Malicious Software Update.This issue affects HYPR Passwordless: before 9.1.
